text: Stephen Tjephe (1 August 1955 - 16 December 2020) was a Burmese Roman Catholic prelate. Tjephe was born in Danoku, Myanmar. He became a priest in 1984. In 2009, Pope Benedict XVI made Tjephe the Titular Bishop of Nova Barbara. In 2015, Pope Francis made him Bishop of Loikaw. Tjephe died on 16 December 2020 in Loikaw, Myanmar at the age of 65.La diocesi di Loikaw in Myanmar piange il vescovo Stephen ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Burmese people Category:Roman Catholic bishops
title: Stephen Tjephe
